title: Incumbent PA Governor Struggles Against Opponent
teaser: Incumbent Republican Pennsylvania Governor Tom Corbett is trailing his Democratic challenger by up to 20 points in some polls.
contentencoded:
Tom Wolf, a Democratic businessman, faced off against Republican Pennsylvania Governor Tom Corbett in a televised debate yesterday.

The debate focused on education, taxes and jobs. The incumbent governor has been struggling in the polls, trailing Wolf by up to 20 points.

Holly Otterbein, a reporter for WHYY, joins Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson to discuss why Corbett is lagging behind.

Guest

  • Holly Otterbein, reporter for WHYY, a member of the Here & Now Contributors Network. She tweets @hollyotterbein.
